item.description:
Study nights are informal sessions where people usually break off into groups and study material of their choice. You can do everything from conversation practice to reading to studying grammar. People of all levels are welcome, but you will get the most out of it if you already have prior experience learning Japanese (or English). Lasts from 6:30PM-8:30PM.

Borders is located right across the street from State Station (Blue Line and Orange Line), and is in walking distance from Park Street and Downtown Crossing (Red Line).

Note that we will likely be in the back section of the cafe, since that's where the bigger tables are.
item.how_to_find_us: Find the table with the J + E Meetup sign
item.name: Japanese and English Study Night
